data.title: GOD FORBID, DEATH ANGEL - Free Tickets Up For Grabs
data.meta_description: Nonelouder.com reports:"Nonelounder.com, Metalsucks.net and Cocaine Energy Drink are teaming up to give you a free pair of tickets to see GOD FORBID and DEATH ANGEL on their current US tour.We will select three winners from each site; each of the six winners will get a...
data.text:
Nonelouder.com reports:

"Nonelounder.com, Metalsucks.net and Cocaine Energy Drink are teaming up to give you a free pair of tickets to see GOD FORBID and DEATH ANGEL on their current US tour.

We will select three winners from each site; each of the six winners will get a pair (that’s TWO) tickets to see God Forbid and Death Angel in the city of their choice, along with a free case of Cocaine Energy Drink.

How do you win, you ask? Well, it’s easy; since we are trying to gain more exposure for local bands, here’s their chance to get it!

Simply post a comment on the special MetalSucks or Nonelounder landing pages with a link to the MySpace or Nonelounder page of your favorite local band. We’ll listen to them all, and we’ll chose three winners on each site. As an added bonus, the six winning bands will get plugs on MetalSucks and Nonelounder. This is your chance to get your band, your friend’s band, or your favorite local dive bar group some real exposure!

Check out the post on Nonelouder.com.

As previously reported, God Forbid are gearing up for the release of their new DVD, Beneath The Scars Of Glory And Progression, due to be released on June 10th via Century Media. The package contains live footage shot at the Starland Ballroom in Sayreville, New Jersey, an hour long documentary and the band's promotional videos.

Disc 1 (Live In Jersey) - 'Force Fed', 'Chains Of Humanity', 'Divide My Destiny', 'Go Your Own Way', 'Anti Hero', 'Better Days', 'The Lonely Dead', 'Reject The Sickness', 'Gone Forever', 'Broken Promise', 'To The Fallen Hero', 'The End of The World', 'Crucify Your Beliefs'.

Disc 2: Rated R For Real (documentary), Videos: 'Better Days', 'Anti Hero', 'Gone Forever', 'The End Of The World', 'To The Fallen Hero', 'Chains Of Humanity'.
